title: Champion proposal
body:
**I have an idea of a new champion named Porokee.**
Its a little bit bigger than a {{summoner:31}} .
His abilities:
Q - 'Ram' he runs to a enemy and stuns him for 1.5 sec and dealing 50/70/85/90/105 damage
everytime he upgrades this ability he gets horns and they grow
W - 'Bite' he bites an enemy near him dealing 80/90/100/115/130 + 10% of your damage and having for this attack 35/40/45/50/55% Lifesteal
everytime he upgrades this ability he gets teeth that grow
E - 'Ice Shield' when using this ability every life he has lost is a shield now that is away after 3 sec (instantly) and he is slowed when activating this for 40%
Passive: he deals 10/15/20/25/30 + 10% of your ability power as magic damage every normal attack
R - 'Ice Wave' He stomps with his front feet on the ground and causes a wave of ice that freezes(stuns and mutes) all enemies and dealing 150/200/250 + 50% of his ability power as magic damage
Passive: Every normal attack slows enemies for 10% of his speed
everytime he upgrades this ability he gets bigger

It is only a idea and the champion if you WOULD must not be same only something like that
if you have some ideas to make him balanced write to me
Would be nice if you add this champ

replies.body:
Q-7sec Cooldown
W-12/13/13/14/15sec Cooldown
E-20sec Cooldown
R-120/110/100sec Cooldown

everything i didnt write you can edit by yourself

Vote this up if you want to see this champ in game
